                                       int answerId)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        this method check if specific answer exist in DB and return the current votes for it.
        Parameters:
        request - - request of answer from client
        response - - sending indicate from server to client if user trying to vote to is answer
        answerId - - the answer user want to vote for
        Returns:
        current number of votes of answer - nubmer of votes for the answerId coming from DB
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • updateVoteOfAnswer

        private void updateVoteOfAnswer(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                      int answerId,
                      int numOfVotes)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        this method update vote of answer after client vote for it , and insert to relation table of votes and answers the user that vote - for handling voting twice
        Parameters:
        request - - request from client for user answer votes
        response - - sending indicate from server to client if user trying to vote twice or success to vote
        answerId -
        numOfVotes - - the number of votes should be update in DB
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
